seed_sent: All birds have wings and feathers.
raw_fol_problem:
Sentence: Penguins are birds.
FOL: Bird(penguins)

Sentence: Penguins do not fly.
FOL: ¬Fly(penguins)

Sentence: Animals that fly must have wings.
FOL: ∀x (Animal(x) ∧ Fly(x) → HasWings(x))

Query: Penguins have wings.
FOL: HasWings(penguins)

Label: TRUE

seed_sent: A mammal can be either a herbivore or a carnivore, but not both.
raw_fol_problem:
Sentence: Elephants are mammals.
FOL: ∀x (Elephant(x) → Mammal(x))

Sentence: Elephants eat plants.
FOL: ∀x (Elephant(x) → Herbivore(x))

Sentence: Lions are mammals.
FOL: ∀x (Lion(x) → Mammal(x))

Sentence: Lions eat meat.
FOL: ∀x (Lion(x) → Carnivore(x))

Query: An elephant is a carnivore.
FOL: ∃x (Elephant(x) ∧ Carnivore(x))

Label: FALSE
